sentences.en: He gave us an emphatic denial.
He is especially emphatic about the value of a precise routine.
sentences.cn: 他特别强调严格按程序走的意义。

sentences.en: He leaned forward and said to Bardo in a low, emphatic tone.
sentences.cn: 他把身子俯下,用低低的着重的语气对巴尔多说.

sentences.en: He was emphatic that he could not work with her.
sentences.cn: 他强调他不能与她共事。

sentences.en: He was emphatic that nuclear arms should be banned.
sentences.cn: 他极力主张应禁止核子武器.

sentences.en: He was so emphatic in style.
sentences.cn: 他的语调是那么抑扬顿挫.

sentences.en: His response was immediate and emphatic.
Huei - fang's only reply was an emphatic shake of her head.
sentences.cn: 四小姐用劲地摇着头,不出声.

sentences.en: I answered both questions with an emphatic "Yes".
sentences.cn: 对于那两个问题，我都语气坚定地回答“是”。

sentences.en: It'suggested itself to him that women were often very emphatic in their expressions.
sentences.cn: 在他看来,这事本身只不过说明了妇女在表达她们的感情时,总是小题大作.

sentences.en: The servant girl hurried upstairs, convinced by the man's strained and emphatic manner.
sentences.cn: 女仆看到这个人紧张而郑重的神情, 相信了,急忙上楼去.

sentences.en: Their reply was too emphatic for anyone to doubt them.
sentences.cn: 他们的回答很坚决,不容有任何人怀疑.

sentences.en: While Mr Giovanelli bade him farewell with a too emphatic flourish of the hat.
sentences.cn: 乔瓦耐里先生则是故意把帽用力一挥,向他道别.

sentences.en: Yesterday's emphatic victory was their fifth in succession.
sentences.cn: 昨天的大胜是他们连续第5场胜利。
您未免言重了, 亲爱的医生.

trans.tran_cn: 强调的，加强语气的，明显的
trans.tran_en: expressing an opinion, idea etc in a clear, strong way to show its importance
